page.title: 10THE FORUM SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: The Forum is thelargest and most popular shopping centre in North Hykeham.The precinct takes its name from the Roman Forum(centre of commerce),because of the Roman COnnections in the Area.The Forum is adjacent to the A46 which was the Roman Fosseway road. The Forum was built in the early 1960's for a London property company on open farmland,which has become a concentrated residential area. There is a large variety of shops and services available.There is a post office,estate agents,solicitors and banks.The shops and offices,30 in total,are built along 3sides of a central carpark capable of holding 100 cars.
